name: NarraFirma
description: NarraFirma webapp for Participatory Narrative Inquiry

scripts.build-wp: rm -rf distribution/narrafirma.zip && rm -rf distribution/narrafirma && mkdir distribution/narrafirma && tsc && cp -r WebContent wordpress-plugin/narrafirma/* distribution/narrafirma && cd distribution && zip -qr narrafirma.zip narrafirma/* && cd .. && rm -rf distribution/narrafirma
